title: Heera Aur Panna Kundan Jhumki - Diamond & Emerald Stud Earring
materials: Emerald. The earring is finished with a delicate Hyderabadi polish
features: This exquisite stud earring features a beautiful Kundan Polki diamond slice, intricately set in a bezel setting surrounded by small diamonds. A pear-shaped Emerald dangles gracefully below, enhancing the overall appeal of the design. The Kundan setting showcases the timeless art of South Indian jewelry making, reflecting a blend of tradition and contemporary aesthetics.
colors: The primary colors are the golden hue of the 22K gold
the milky white sparkle of the Polki diamond
the brilliance of the surrounding Diamonds and the vibrant green of the Emerald.
occasions: or any grand celebration. This earring will add a touch of traditional elegance to your look. Also perfect for everyday wear to work
description: A blend of traditional Kundan craftsmanship with modern design elements. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and a vibrant Emerald ensures a striking and timeless piece. The Hyderabadi polish adds an extra layer of elegance and guarantees long-lasting shine. This earring will definitely catch the eye of others!
